title: LoL Client Greys out after Login
body:
Hey guys,

I went to log into LoL today, it did its small patch, upon login, the client went Dark (like when you get gifted a skin or something) and its stuck like that. I cant click on anything, i have to CAD the client to close it. upon relogin its fine, then a few seconds later it goes dark again.

http://puu.sh/fT1pF/e3667b54d8.jpg Normal when logging in.

http://puu.sh/fT0OD/d52b83dfb6.jpg Gone dark after a few seconds.

Any advice or help would be great.

replies.body:
Never mind about this. After running a repair and logging in i got the following.

http://puu.sh/fT4jl/bcd61c5cd2.jpgz

Appears the game was just getting stuck on that screen. :)
Wow, that's weird. What resolution is your monitor at?
